|brand = Synology |model = USB Station |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = 2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/20/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Synology_USB_Station_2 |series = USB Station |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 08-04ADM0113 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6180; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L8006E; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = NAND |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Samsung;K9F1G08U0D-SCB0; |flash2size = 128 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Elpida;E1116AEBG-8E-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1116R; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell (v3.4.27); |stockos = Linux;2.6.32.12;DSM 3.2;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel (EIAJ-02) |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.0 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery |addchip = Enhanced USB2.0 Flash Drive Controller;AFA Technologies;UT165-L48;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 30V 2A Step-Down Switching Regulator;Semtech;SC4525;;1;,,, 1.5/2.5A Dual Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54291;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- SUS204 --> |manuf_rev = <!-- 1.3 --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2010 |estprice = 150 |upc = 4711174720804 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00466VR4C |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:08-04ADM0113", "Model:SUS204" and "Ver:V1.3" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|Synology DiskStation Devices|List of NAS Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6180 @800MHz (''Kirkwood'' ARM v5) *Memory: 128MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 1MB SPI NOR Flash, 128MB NAND Flash *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 5V/2A via EIAJ-02 barrel
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.theregister.com/2011/01/14/review_synology_usb_station_2/ ''Synology USB Station 2'' on '''The Register'''] (Jan. 2011) *[https://www.cnet.com/reviews/synology-usb-station-2-review/ ''Synology USB Station 2 review'' on '''CNet'''] (Nov. 2010) *[https://bit-tech.net/reviews/tech/storage/synology-usb-station-2-review/1/ ''Synology USB Station 2 Review'' on '''bit-tech'''] (Jan. 2011)
